item.title: Interview Questions for Go Developer Position
item.description: Foreword There is no such thing as essential interview questions. Despite the fact that I’m trying to help you, formulate questions and/or answers, I cannot help you point in the right direction, since each job has specific requirements and each person is unique. My word of advising is don’t jump to conclusions, just because someone didn’t answer your question like you expected you to do. And there are people out there - myself included - who are able to explain you a concept without remembering the actual name or the acronym.
